text:
Seriously. I want your #COVID19 #vaccine stories. 
Retweet, reply, or shoot a DM. The vaccine is safe, free, and easy to get. It's also how we write a new ending to this pandemic.@CardinalAndPine #ncpol #coronavirusNC #coronavirus #VaccinesWork @ncdhhs @SecMandyCohen @NC_Governor https://t.co/lIzwdWl38X
